ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), ISNEW(), OR( LOWER(Title)="mr.", LOWER(Title)="mr", LOWER(Title)="mrs.", LOWER(Title)="mrs", LOWER(Title)="ms.", LOWER(Title)="ms", LOWER(Title)="dr.", LOWER(Title)="dr", LOWER(Title)="prof.", LOWER(Title)="prof", ISBLANK(Title) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter Job Titles (eg.: CEO, CFO, etc.) instead of salutation (eg.: Mr., Mrs., etc.) If unknown, search LinkedIn, or reach out to the customer.
